wines.description: This magnum-format Catalan white from Alella showcases the region's distinctive terroir with extended bottle age.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of honeyed fruit, citrus, nuts, and aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with evolved acidity, rich fruit, and developed character
tastingNotes.finish: Complex finish with lingering aged notes

wineDetails.style: Aged Catalan white in magnum format

wines.description: This Finger Lakes Riesling showcases New York's premier wine region with balance between sweetness and acidity.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of lime, green apple, white flowers, honey, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with electric acidity, citrus fruit, and balanced sweetness
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with citrus and mineral notes

wineDetails.ageability: Best within 3-5 years; drink now through 2028

wines.description: This Basque Txakolina showcases Spain's coastal white wine tradition with slight effervescence and saline character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, green apple, sea spray, and white flowers
tastingNotes.palate: Light-bodied with high acidity, citrus flavors, slight spritz, and pronounced saline minerality
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and sea salt notes

servingInfo.glassware: Pour from height into tumbler (traditional) or white wine glass

wineDetails.region: Getariako Txakolina DO, Basque Country, Spain
wineDetails.grapeVariety: Hondarrabi Zuri with possible Hondarrabi Beltza
wineDetails.style: Traditional Basque Txakolina with slight effervescence
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed young; drink within 1-2 years

wines.description: This sparkling wine showcases limestone-influenced character with refreshing bubbles and minerality.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, white flowers, brioche, and chalk
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with lively bubbles, citrus flavors, and distinct mineral character
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, mineral-driven finish with persistent bubbles

wines.productName: Libertine Dion Vineyards Carbonic Red Syrah III 2021
wines.description: This carbonic maceration Syrah from Libertine showcases innovative winemaking with bright fruit and approachable tannins.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of fresh red berries, violet, banana, and bubble gum from carbonic maceration
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins, juicy fruit, and vibrant character from carbonic technique
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, fruit-forward finish with gentle tannins

wineDetails.style: Carbonic maceration Syrah with approachable character
wineDetails.ageability: Best within 3-5 years; drink now through 2026

wines.description: This Spanish Roble (oak-aged) wine showcases traditional winemaking with moderate oak influence.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of red cherry, plum, vanilla, and toast
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins, red fruit, and gentle oak notes
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with fruit and subtle oak

wineDetails.style: Spanish Roble with moderate oak aging

wines.productName: Quinta do Mourao White 90 Year Port (500 ml)
wines.description: This rare white port from Quinta do Mourão offers unique aged character in half-bottle format with remarkable complexity.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dried fruits, nuts, caramel, honey, and aged oxidative notes
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with complex sweetness, nutty flavors, and remarkable aged character
tastingNotes.finish: Very long, complex finish with layers of aged fruit and nut notes

servingInfo.glassware: Small port or dessert wine glass

wineDetails.style: Aged white port with oxidative character

wines.description: This aged Napa Sauvignon Blanc showcases considerable bottle development with evolved character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of honey, baked apple, nuts, and aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with evolved acidity, rich honeyed fruit, and developed character
tastingNotes.finish: Complex finish with lingering aged notes

wineDetails.style: Aged Napa Sauvignon Blanc with development

wines.description: This Georgian Saperavi made in traditional qvevri showcases ancient winemaking techniques with distinctive character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark berries, spice, earth, and distinctive qvevri character
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, dark fruit, earthy notes, and rustic texture from qvevri aging
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with structured tannins and earthy complexity

wines.description: This Gran Reserva Rioja from Monte Real showcases extended aging with elegant tertiary complexity.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dried cherry, leather, tobacco, cedar, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with silky tannins, evolved fruit, and complex tertiary character
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with aged sophistication
